fr.sii.ogham.email.sendgrid.v4.sender.impl.sendgrid.compat

Interface MailCompat

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CorrectPackageNameMailCompat, WrongPackageNameMailCompat

    public interface MailCompat
    Wrapper interface that delegates operations to the real SendGrid objects. This is needed since sendgrid-java has issue with generated packages.
    Author:
    Aur√©lien Baudet
    See Also:
    CompatUtil

        List<PersonalizationCompat> getPersonalization()
